pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa uyyāne cittāgāre paṭibhānacittaṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:6.6: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchantī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo cittāgāraṃ dassanāya gacchissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:7.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī rājāgāraṃ vā cittāgāraṃ vā ārāmaṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā pokkharaṇiṃ vā dassanāya gaccheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:10.2: yattha katthaci rañño kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:11.2: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:12.2: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kato hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:13.2: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ kataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:14.2: yattha katthaci manussānaṃ kīḷituṃ ramituṃ katā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:15.3: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:15.6: Dassanūpacāraṃ vijahitvā punappunaṃ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
